item.title: MVC Application using Spring Boot and JSP
item.description:
In this article, I will be developing a Model-View-Controller (MVC) application using Spring Boot and JSP for the Microservice Application that was created in Microservice Using Spring Boot, Hibernate and H2 Database, which exposes the REST APIs as a backend application.

However, in this article, I will create an User Interface (UI) for that application using JSP in Spring Boot, in order to make Model-View-Controller (MVC) architecture work.
